page.description: Mailmerge into Microsoft Word. Choice = "new" or "template" for an existing template. Mergedata is a comma delimited txt fie.
page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5_word_merge(C choice ,C mergedata [,C template ])

argument.name: choice
argument.description: "new" = displays the Microsoft Mail Merge dialog box. "template" = requires the Template argument. Character

argument.name: mergedata
argument.description: The name of a text file containing comma delimited data. Character

argument.name: template
argument.description: Optional. The name of a template. Character

page.discussion: The A5_WORD_MERGE() function exports data to Microsoft Word 's Mail Merge function. The function can use an existing template or open the Microsoft Word 's Mail Merge dialog box to create a template on the fly.
